article_text: The free medical clinic at Kansas City’s Bartle Hall last weekend was great for patients, but it was intended to make a point. Sadly, that point is willfully lost on key people in high places.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Obamacare, Affordable Care Act, Medicaid expansion , Missouri, Kansas, insurance

article_metadata.title: Know what’s really sick? Missouri, Kansas being stupid on health care | The Kansas City Star

article_summary:
The free medical clinic at Kansas City’s Bartle Hall last weekend was great for patients, but it was intended to make a point.
Sadly, that point is willfully lost on key people in high places.
